snippet: Julius Malema, the firebrand leader of the Youth League for South Africa’s governing African National Congress, was expelled from the party in a decision announced late Wednesday night.
abstract: Julius Malema, the firebrand leader of the Youth League for South Africa’s governing African National Congress, is expelled from the party, bringing an abrupt halt to the meteoric rise of one of the most polarizing figures to emerge on the political scene of post-apartheid South Africa; his appeal of an earlier five-year suspension appears to have backfired, as the party's disciplinary committee decided that he should be cast out altogether.
lead_paragraph: Julius Malema, the firebrand leader of the Youth League for South Africa’s governing African National Congress, was expelled from the party in a decision announced late Wednesday night.

headline.seo: A.N.C. Expels Julius Malema, Rising Star and Youth Leader
headline.main: Once a Star in the A.N.C., Youth Leader Is Expelled
headline.print_headline: Once a Star In the A.N.C., Youth Leader Is Expelled
